base_description: Rectangular gray cabinet with a single door.
part_description: One main rectangular body, a front door with a vertical handle, and an open top. The door is centrally positioned on the front face.
internal_interaction_description: The door is attached to the main body with hinges, allowing it to swing open and closed. The handle provides a grip for easy operation. The open top suggests potential modularity or the ability to stack or integrate with other units.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed on the floor or integrated into a larger furniture system. It interacts with users through the door, which can be opened to store or retrieve items. The handle facilitates this interaction, ensuring accessibility.
